text: National Lampoon's Vacation is a 1983 American comedy movie directed by Harold Ramis and written by John Hughes. It stars Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Randy Quaid, John Candy, Anthony Michael Hall, Christie Brinkley, Jane Krakowski and distributed by Warner Bros. and spawned four sequels. == Other websites == * Category:1983 comedy movies Category:1980s road movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Harold Ramis Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: National Lampoon's Vacation
